lines: Nothing seems to be the way that it used to
Everything seems shallow
God, give me truth in me
And tell me somebody's watching over me
And that is all I'm praying
That someday I will understand in God's whole plan
And what he's done to me
Oh, but maybe someday I will breathe
And I'll finally see - I'll see it all in ur baby
Don't you run too fast my dear,
why don't you stop?
Just stop and listen to your tears
they're all you've got It's in you
I see somebody's watching over you
And that is all I'm praying
That someday you will
understand in God's whole plan
And what he does to you
Oh, but maybe someday you will breathe
And you'll finally see
You'll see it all in ur baby
You'll see it all in ur baby
No moment will be more true
than the moment I look at you
It's in you
I see somebody watching over you
And that's all I'm praying
That someday you will understand
in God's whole plan
And what he does to you
Oh, and maybe someday you will breathe
And you'll finally see
You'll see it all in ur baby -
